required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Fertility Restoration Using Autologous Mesenchymal Stem Cells
clinical_study.official_title: Fertility Restoration Using Autologous Adipose Tissue Derived Mesenchymal Stem Cells

lead_sponsor.agency: Institute of Biophysics and Cell Engineering of National Academy of Sciences of Belarus

collaborator.agency: Belarusian Medical Academy of Post-Graduate Education

clinical_study.source: Institute of Biophysics and Cell Engineering of National Academy of Sciences of Belarus

brief_summary.textblock: Treatment of the patients with scarring and adhesions in the uterus resulting from caesarean section or chronic inflammation in the mucosa of the uterus and fallopian tubes and preventing the occurrence of these effects in the future

detailed_description.textblock: The aim of the project is to develop a biomedical cell product based on autologous adipose tissue derived mesenchymal stem cells and a biodegradable carrier for highly effective treatment and prevention of scarring and adhesions in the uterus acquired as a result of cesarean section or chronic inflammatory processes in the uterine mucosa and fallopian tubes; to conduct the clinical trials of the biomedical cell product in the treatment of uterus scarring and infertility in women.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with treatment-related adverse events
primary_outcome.description: MSC application related adverse events assessed by blood count, liver and function tests

arm_group.description: Patients with impending caesarean section or with chronic inflammation in the mucosa of the uterus and fallopian tubes receiving standard treatment and mesenchymal stem cells
Patients with impending caesarean section or with chronic inflammation in the mucosa of the uterus and fallopian tubes receiving standard treatment

intervention.description: Autologous adipose tissue-derived mesenchymal stem cells
standard treatment according to clinical protocols

overall_official.affiliation: Head of the Lab of Institute of Biophysics and Cell Engineering

facility.name: Institute of Biophysics and Cell Engineering of National Academy of Sciences of Belarus
